name: Storage Space 13
description:
Stor­age Space 13 is a chal­len­ging and fun puzzle game that tele­ports you to an aban­doned space­ship. On this space­ship you can tele­port around with the con­trol­lers. You need to get close to the crates to push them by trig­ger­ing them and they will start to slide un­til they hit some­thing. Can you place them all on the vents?

Stor­age Space 13 is a re­build of the win­ning WebXR game from this year’s JS13K game jam and was ori­gin­ally built in only 13KB. Since then, per­form­ance is im­proved and more levels were ad­ded.

Instructions
  • Trig­ger to tele­port, move crate or se­lect menu
  • X or A to re­turn to the menu to re­start the level
Note

The game is built to run on Oculus Quest!
